document.full_text: "pirates of the caribbean: on stranger tides" racked up an $18.5 million opening day gross wednesday on the foreign theatrical circuit in 10 overseas territories, according to figures reported today by walt disney pictures.
document.title: new "pirates" movie earns $18.5 million overseas
lines_and_colors: "pirates of the caribbean: on stranger tides" racked up an $18.5 million opening day gross wednesday on the foreign theatrical circuit in 10 overseas territories, according to figures reported today by walt disney pictures.
